hero.title: Lost in Shibuya?
hero.subtitle: Find your best GAPTIME
hero.description: Got an hour to spare in Shibuya? Discover and book unique local experiences instantly. Don't just kill time—make it unforgettable.

step1.title: Choose your travel motive
step1.description: Select the type of experience that matches your mood and interests

step2.title: Find your favorite gap time
step2.description: Discover activities that fit perfectly into your available time

step3.title: Get coupon or book it!
step3.description: Secure exclusive deals or instantly book your chosen experience

articles.title: Articles
articles.subtitle: Discover Shibuya's hidden gems and insider tips for your free time.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.subtitle: Find your best activities in Shibuya
experiences.findPerfectActivity: Find the perfect activity for your trip
experiences.whatKindOfExperience: What kind of experience are you looking for?
experiences.selectMotivationDescription: Select your travel motivation to discover curated experiences that match your interests and create unforgettable memories in Shibuya.
experiences.motivationBenefits: Our motivation-based approach helps you find experiences that truly resonate with your travel goals and create meaningful memories.
experiences.personalizedDesc: Find experiences that match your specific interests and travel goals
experiences.curatedDesc: Handpicked experiences that deliver authentic local experiences
experiences.memorableDesc: Create lasting memories with experiences that truly matter to you

events.title: Events
events.subtitle: Upcoming Shibuya festivals, seasonal celebrations, and special events.

motivations.shopCraftDesc: Create and discover unique crafts and shopping experiences
motivations.familyTimeDesc: Create unforgettable memories with your loved ones in Shibuya
motivations.moveAdventureDesc: Discover thrilling adventures in Tokyo's dynamic heart
motivations.relaxRechargeDesc: Find your perfect escape in the heart of bustling Shibuya
motivations.cultureHeritageDesc: Immerse yourself in authentic Japanese culture and traditions
motivations.strollObserveDesc: Take a leisurely stroll through Shibuya's streets and observe local life
motivations.tasteLocalDesc: Experience local flavors and food culture, enjoy Shibuya's culinary scene

quizResultModal.noResultHeroDescription: Complete the quiz to unlock personalized recommendations.
quizResultModal.noResultBodyDescription: Take the quiz now to discover Gappy chat suggestions tailored to your interests.

shareCard.shareSheet: Share via Instagram or share sheet
shareCard.noteInstagram: For Instagram, save the image first, then post from the app.
shareCard.xImageCopied: Image copied to clipboard. Please paste the image in the X post composer.
shareCard.xImageDownloaded: Image downloaded. Please upload the image in the X post composer.

footer.description: Discover extraordinary experiences and events to make the most of your free time in Japan.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Gappy Inc. is an innovative company that transforms travelers' gap time into valuable experiences.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By using our website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website or services.

couponService.title: Coupon Service
couponService.content: Our website provides coupons for various experiences. These coupons are subject to the terms and conditions of each experience provider. We are not responsible for any issues arising from the use of coupons or the experiences themselves.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of our company or our licensors and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: In no event shall we be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Gappy! We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our website and services. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not access the site.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.description: We may collect information about you in various ways. The information we may collect on the site includes:

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.content: Personally identifiable information such as your name, email address, and demographic information (such as age and nationality) that you voluntarily provide when registering for coupons or interacting with the site.

derivativeData.title: Derivative Data
derivativeData.content: Information our servers automatically collect when you access the site, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, access times, and the pages you viewed immediately before and after accessing the site.

useOfInformation.title: Use of Your Information
useOfInformation.description: Having accurate information about you enables us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you via the site to:
useOfInformation.statisticalData: Generate anonymous statistical data and analytics for internal use
useOfInformation.efficiency: Improve the efficiency and operation of the site
useOfInformation.monitorUsage: Monitor and analyze usage and trends to improve your experience on the site

disclosure.title: Disclosure of Your Information
disclosure.description: We may share information we have collected about you in certain situations. Your information may be disclosed as follows:

byLaw.title: By Law or to Protect Rights
byLaw.content: If we believe the release of information about you is necessary to respond to legal process, to investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies, or to protect the rights, property, and safety of others, we may share your information as permitted or required by applicable law, rule, or regulation.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Service Providers
thirdParty.content: We may share your information with third parties that perform services for us or on our behalf, including data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, and customer service.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
